    orcid: 0000-0001-8302-1138
    affiliation: Professor, UW - School of Aquatic and Fishery Sciences
    affiliation-url: https://robertslab.info
date: 07-19-2023
categories: [Quarto, R, tidyverse, ggplot, qPCR] # self-defined categories
citation: 
  url: https://samanthacsik.github.io/posts/2022-10-24-quarto-blogs/ 
image: http://gannet.fish.washington.edu/seashell/snaps/Monosnap_lsamp-2023_-_main_-_RStudio_2023-07-21_13-31-47.png

---

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
── Attaching core tidyverse packages ──────────────────────── tidyverse 2.0.0 ──
✔ dplyr     1.1.0     ✔ readr     2.1.4
✔ forcats   1.0.0     ✔ stringr   1.5.0
✔ ggplot2   3.4.1     ✔ tibble    3.1.8
✔ lubridate 1.9.2     ✔ tidyr     1.3.0
✔ purrr     1.0.1     
── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ──
✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter()
✖ dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag()
ℹ Use the conflicted package (<http://conflicted.r-lib.org/>) to force all conflicts to become errors
```
:::
:::


Converted Cq value to aev with: =10^(-(0.3012 * E2) + 11.434)




::: {.cell hash='index_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_fd53775109d5d68cea6aa4a74f7cf7eb'}

```{.r .cell-code}
qpcr <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sr320/lsamp-2023/main/data/SR-qpcr-data-1.csv", header = TRUE) 
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data = qpcr, mapping = aes(x = Subgroup, y = CqMean)) + 
  geom_boxplot()  +
  facet_wrap('Target')
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning: Removed 1 rows containing non-finite values (`stat_boxplot()`).
```
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data = qpcr, mapping = aes(x = Subgroup, y = aev)) + 
  geom_boxplot() +
  facet_wrap('Target')
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning: Removed 1 rows containing non-finite values (`stat_boxplot()`).
```
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
qpcr %>%
  filter(Target == "Cg_18s(1408/9)") %>%
ggplot(mapping = aes(x = Subgroup, y = aev)) + 
  geom_boxplot()  +
  geom_jitter(aes(color = history), width = 0.1, alpha = 0.7)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
qpcr %>%
  filter(Target == "Cg_GAPDH(1172/3)")  %>%
ggplot(mapping = aes(x = Subgroup, y = aev)) + 
  geom_boxplot()  +
  geom_jitter(aes(color = history), width = 0.1, alpha = 0.7)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning: Removed 1 rows containing non-finite values (`stat_boxplot()`).
```
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning: Removed 1 rows containing missing values (`geom_point()`).
```
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
qpcr %>%
  filter(Target == "Cg_ATPsynthase(1385/6)")  %>%
ggplot(mapping = aes(x = Subgroup, y = aev)) + 
  geom_boxplot()  +
  geom_jitter(aes(color = history), width = 0.1, alpha = 0.7)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
qpcr %>%
  filter(Target == "Cg_citratesynthase(1383/4)")  %>%
ggplot(mapping = aes(x = Subgroup, y = aev)) + 
  geom_boxplot()  +
  geom_jitter(aes(color = history), width = 0.1, alpha = 0.7)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672}
